channel.title: [637][Eclipse]Allow use of dragon pickaxe for mining
channel.description:
My server has the d pick in the game, you can equip it and everything about it works besides the most important thing...you can't use it for mining. Any help to getting it to use for mining would be great.
EDIT:NVM, I figured it out. Thought it was harder than just adding the pickaxe ID, level requirement and animation ID to the mining.java file.
